title: Brasher puts 6-month halt on cryptocurrency plans
content_text: The Brasher Town Board has placed a six-month moratorium on cryptocurrency mining operations until it can develop zoning regulations that govern the operations. The moratorium will expire on Oct. 31

title: 75% of Americans don't trust crypto—and nearly half of traders say their investments have performed worse than expected
